packages.name: Weekend Wildlife Escape
packages.description: Perfect weekend getaway to experience Maharashtra's premier tiger reserve with comfortable accommodation and guided safaris.
packages.fullDescription: Escape the hustle and bustle of city life with our weekend wildlife package to Tadoba Andhari Tiger Reserve. This carefully curated experience offers the perfect balance of adventure and comfort, featuring two exciting safari rides through tiger territory, comfortable accommodation, and expert guidance throughout your journey.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Evening Safari
itinerary.description: Arrive at Tadoba, check into your accommodation, and embark on your first evening safari to spot tigers and other wildlife.

itinerary.title: Morning Safari & Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning safari for the best wildlife sightings, followed by breakfast and departure.
activities: Optional visit to local tribal village

terms: ID proof required for all guests
Children below 5 years pay infant rate
Safari timings subject to forest department rules
Cancellation charges apply as per policy

packages.name: Photography Master Class
packages.description: Intensive wildlife photography workshop in Melghat Tiger Reserve with professional equipment and expert guidance.
packages.fullDescription: Master the art of wildlife photography in the pristine wilderness of Melghat Tiger Reserve. This comprehensive workshop includes professional camera equipment, expert guidance from wildlife photographers, and hands-on experience in capturing the perfect wildlife shots.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Equipment Briefing
itinerary.description: Arrival, camera equipment distribution, and basic photography workshop followed by evening safari.

itinerary.title: Full Day Photography Safari
itinerary.description: Intensive photography day with morning and evening safaris, plus editing workshop.

itinerary.title: Final Safari & Portfolio Creation
itinerary.description: Final safari session and creation of your photography portfolio.

terms: All equipment provided but can bring own
Certificate valid for wildlife photography courses

packages.name: Family Adventure Package
packages.description: Perfect family adventure combining wildlife education, safety, and fun activities for all ages in Mumbai's urban national park.
packages.fullDescription: Designed specifically for families with children, this package offers a safe and educational wildlife experience in Sanjay Gandhi National Park. Features kid-friendly safaris, educational activities, and safety measures to ensure a memorable experience for the entire family.

itinerary.title: Family Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Family-friendly safari with educational activities and visit to Kanheri Caves.

itinerary.title: Nature Trails & Departure
itinerary.description: Nature walks, interactive sessions, and family bonding activities.

terms: Child safety gear mandatory for kids under 12
Adult supervision required at all times

packages.name: Luxury Safari Experience
packages.description: Ultimate luxury wildlife experience with 5-star accommodation, private safaris, and premium services.
packages.fullDescription: Indulge in the ultimate wildlife luxury experience with our premium package featuring 5-star resort accommodation, private safari vehicles, personal butler service, and helicopter transfers. This exclusive experience combines wildlife adventure with unmatched comfort and personalized service.

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival Experience
itinerary.description: Helicopter arrival, luxury suite check-in, welcome ceremony, and private evening safari.
activities: Private evening safari with expert naturalist

itinerary.title: Premium Safari & Spa Day
itinerary.description: Private morning safari, luxury spa treatments, fine dining, and cultural entertainment.
activities: Private dawn safari with breakfast in jungle
Full body spa and wellness treatments

itinerary.title: Final Safari & Departure
itinerary.description: Final private safari, luxury brunch, and helicopter departure.

packages.name: Multi-Park Explorer
packages.description: Comprehensive Maharashtra wildlife tour covering three national parks with cultural experiences and comfortable transportation.
packages.fullDescription: Explore the diverse wildlife heritage of Maharashtra with our comprehensive multi-park tour. Visit Tadoba, Melghat, and Sanjay Gandhi National Parks while experiencing local culture, comfortable accommodations, and expert guidance throughout your journey.

itinerary.title: Tadoba Andhari Tiger Reserve
itinerary.description: Arrival at Tadoba, evening safari, and overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Tadoba to Melghat
itinerary.description: Morning safari at Tadoba, travel to Melghat, evening arrival.

itinerary.title: Melghat Tiger Reserve
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Melghat with morning and evening safaris.
activities: Morning safari in Melghat core zone

itinerary.title: Melghat to Mumbai
itinerary.description: Travel to Mumbai and evening at Sanjay Gandhi National Park.
activities: Drive to Mumbai (6 hours with stops)

itinerary.title: Sanjay Gandhi & Departure
itinerary.description: Morning safari at Sanjay Gandhi National Park and departure.
activities: Morning safari at Sanjay Gandhi Park

packages.name: Corporate Team Building
packages.description: Professional corporate retreat combining team building activities with wildlife experiences in a natural setting.
packages.fullDescription: Strengthen team bonds and boost morale with our corporate team building package. Combines professional meeting facilities with unique wildlife experiences, team challenges, and networking opportunities in the natural environment of Sanjay Gandhi National Park.

itinerary.title: Team Building & Safari
itinerary.description: Ice-breaking activities, team challenges, safari experience, and evening networking.

itinerary.title: Workshops & Departure
itinerary.description: Leadership workshops, problem-solving activities, and team presentations.
